title: 3 cups of coffee a day lowers risk of dementia
desc: A large new study has found that drinking 2-3 cups of coffee a day or one to two cups of tea was associated with reduced dementia risk.

title: Rural cancer patients benefit from local surgical care
desc: Adults living in rural communities often travel long distances when seeking treatment for cancer, but distant travel may not always be necessary to receive high-quality surgical care, according to a new analysis published in the Journal of the American College of Surgeons (JACS).
